1019279299197784064.text:
The Polkadot community has successfully voted to upgrade the chain to POC-2! View the current block number and validators submitting data under the Krumme Lanke tab: http://telemetry.polkadot.io/  

To move your node from POC-1 to POC-2 use this guide:https://github.com/paritytech/polkadot/wiki/Moving-from-PoC-1-to-PoC-2 …

1019223039265902593.text:
Polkadot is attempting a live governance-based upgrade of the global testnet, from POC-1 to the new POC-2 runtime. This will mark the first major attempt at an on-chain protocol upgrade in the wild. 

Follow the progress on Riot -  https://riot.im/app/#/room/#polkadot-watercooler:matrix.org …pic.twitter.com/YfVghIdgh9

1043175762919088131.text: Under good network conditions we can finalize blocks almost instantly. In the case of network partitions, we can finalize millions of blocks at once when they resolve. The number of blocks finalized at a time is independent from network overhead.

1043175176584798208.text: GRANDPA (GHOST-based Recursive Ancestor Deriving Prefix Agreement) gives near-instant and asynchronously, accountably safe finality in a hybrid consensus blockchain.
